website_summaries.verdict: The LG Tribute HD for Boost Mobile offers decent performance for the price, but it's held back by lackluster battery life and a mediocre camera.

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought it again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone so much I bought it again when I dropped my first one cracking the screen. I still use it as an internet portable radio. I bought a shock-resistant case for my new one. I highly recommend this product. Of course the LG name has a superb reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cute phone but feature problems
customer_reviews.text: this phone lasted a little while for use till one day it stopped connecting to wifi (all networks) , ive researched onliine several times in hopes to finding a simple solution for this problem only to find many other customers have experinced the same issue with the phone. /decent phone but in long run, is it really worth it? .....I wouldnt purchase again. or Recommend. sorry.
customer_reviews.author: QueenKaya

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Charge overnight but does not carry the charge for a full day only about 8 hrs, disappointed as other than writing this is the only way my disabled son can communicate as he cannot speak.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Good choices for people don't need fancy smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Shipping is really fast, good quality with awesome price!! Good choices for people don't need fancy smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: yisha liang

customer_reviews.title: Great phone & Great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. It's my daughters BIG Christmas gift this year. All she wanted was an LG. So glad I got this one. It's slim, light weight and fast. We've been boost customers for years so we know the service is good. For the price I don't think you'll find a better phone!!
customer_reviews.author: M.Duarte

customer_reviews.title: The display and camera are much better than expected at this price point
customer_reviews.text: The display and camera are much better than expected at this price point! The phone will run any app without issue. The battery life is pretty terrible though. My daughter is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tntophat

customer_reviews.title: WiFi and SMS Issues
customer_reviews.text: This phone has ongoing issues connecting to WiFi and receiving text messages that contain pictures. I've been struggling for about three months now and have not found any resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Good budget phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband so he would have a new cell phone on his college alumni trip. He had trouble working the apps but I had no problem...wish it came with more internal memory.
customer_reviews.author: Holly J. Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Starter Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter phone for a young child. It bought for my niece as a Christmas gift. Light in weight, and we got her a unicorn case for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cintale

customer_reviews.title: Phone crashed after less than a month
customer_reviews.text: It was the worst device i ever purchased to replace a phone with a broken screen Under a month it would no longer charge. Garbage Can!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Phone is excellent easy to use and a good size screen it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone is excellent easy to use and a good size screen it's light weight and thin. Overall very satisfied with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rosendo Ontiveros

customer_reviews.title: Phone is too old for US market
customer_reviews.text: Boost has updated so many times since this phone came out that it is no longer viable for the US market. The tech at the Boost store could not get the phone, SIM, and network to talk to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy slow camera even takes a good while tou focus definately not worth the buy i ...
customer_reviews.text: Glitchy slow camera even takes a good while tou focus definately not worth the buy i have had 30 dollar phones that worked more efficiently internet freezes frequently
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very basic
customer_reviews.text: Pay a little more and get yourself a better phone, had a ton of pop up ads.
customer_reviews.author: candy a. smith

customer_reviews.title: LG Cell Phone
customer_reviews.text: in the description it read phone is unlock it wasn 't company said i could return for a full refund that wasn't true I still have the Moblie Phone
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: All that and then some
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my 9 year old daughter...it's everything she wanted and more!
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Good phone wrong carrier advertised
customer_reviews.text: The phone was nice to be a used phone. But where it goes wrong is that I thought I was buying a phone with boost mobile as the carrier and was I wrong . I went to get it everything switched over and they told me it wasn’t a boost mobile phone. So now I have to figure out who the carrier is to the phone , which takes up more time and more money .
customer_reviews.author: Nijah Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but ok
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok phone just wish battery lasted longer than what it did
customer_reviews.author: Cherie freymuth

customer_reviews.title: Never buying again
customer_reviews.text: Worse phone ever out of the box started showing pop up ads when I went to use the phone ..very dangerous if ever in a emergency...never buying this brand ever again ....can't use it have to fight pop up ..and even virus and pop up aps don't work

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: will not allow me to use this virgin mobile phone with virgin mobile says only sprint or boost mobile. What a waste of money!

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Phone overheats, sound is muffled, and does not connect to Wifi

customer_reviews.title: Decent valu
customer_reviews.text: Wish the camera was better. It is okay but not good if you want crystal clear images like a real camera.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, is a greag deal.
customer_reviews.text: This a great cell phone for an under 100$ phone.

customer_reviews.title: I like the
customer_reviews.text: I already wrote a 5 stars review on LG Tribute HD on this product, but any, I like the product

customer_reviews.title: works just like you would expect a phone to work have had ...
customer_reviews.text: works just like you would expect a phone to work have had no problems at all with it swapped if from an existing Boost account in just seconds.
customer_reviews.author: April Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not scanned to activate
customer_reviews.text: They are not unlocked or scanned for activation. Phone carrier couldn't help. BS. Buy directly from Boost.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sass

customer_reviews.title: Not a good phone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone must have been used before and sold as new. It has been giving my husband hearing issues every since it was purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone. The only problem I see so far is the volume won't get as loud as it should.

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy It
customer_reviews.text: The battery life Sucks and its need updates EveryDay. Never buy again

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: The phone I received was refurbished and supposed to work, but when I received it that wasnt the case. The screen has scratches, it turns off for no reason, freezes constantly, and the worst part is Im stuck with it for now unless I can get someone to help me.
customer_reviews.author: Rori Jenelle

customer_reviews.title: Battery life drains when plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: Got the phone and after 2 days the battery life drained very quickly. The phone would slowly charge and then the battery percentage would go down dramatically.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone the only thing i dont like the front camera

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Did not activate it before they sent it to me. I had to buy a different phone. Waste of money

customer_reviews.title: Great thin/sleek lil phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone as far as sleek n thin “ness” of it. The caviat being that the battery life on it leaves a lot to be desired.

customer_reviews.title: No SIM card
customer_reviews.text: Like the storage, touch screen. Great to keep up with my busy day.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great phone very light weight and anice size screen.

customer_reviews.title: Pin number

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get into phone to change the number. I was told the phone was probably stolen!!

customer_reviews.title: Being able to hear
customer_reviews.text: Did not allow me to speak normally without speaker or headphones

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage phone
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and very cheaply made. Buttons did not work. Do not buy this phone!

customer_reviews.title: Needs better battery life
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality and the battery only last a hr or 2 I regret buying this phone

customer_reviews.title: V
customer_reviews.text: I was expected it 2 days after ordering. Did not received notification that it was sitting in the post office for 2 weeks by then I had purchased the same phone from Target for less than I got it for on Amazon. I love the phone, it's light weight. I'm having problems accessing my Google account and hearing people at times (sometimes sounds like their under water) and it super sensitive to touch.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Phone is horrible, purchased for my daughter & it won't stay connected to Wi-Fi or 4g, but when it is connected to either it takes eternity to load anything (games, YouTube, etc.) There's no extra apps loaded on it, I've wiped it clean & did a complete restart multiple times & no difference. Boost is great but this phone sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Gat0r_1

customer_reviews.title: Shaping lives
customer_reviews.text: To be honest i had a crap phone before this one and the difference between them are intensely far stretch i think every day why i didn't upgrade but it was like joining a crew between the Android world and im glad i stuck with LG
customer_reviews.author: mauricewashington

customer_reviews.title: Battery drains real easy even i'm just on Facebook all day
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a replacement because it was stuck in headphone mode. Battery drains real easy even i'm just on Facebook all day. battery and memory clearing apps don't work which slows the phone even more and drains the battery MORE!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sampson

customer_reviews.title: So bad!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give you 0 points I would do it, in the description of the cell was not placed that does not work with sim card, when you have the cell phone in hand is that you prove that it does not. So bad!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a Christmas present for my daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I did not like it I can not unlock the phone for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it I can not unlock the phone for my country since they force you to wait 12 months active in boost to be able to unblock and unfairly
customer_reviews.author: Randi Herrera

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PHONES.. THEY GET HOT AND SCREEN CRACKS WHEN YOU PUT IT DOWN NOT EVEN HARD!!! SOOO DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for Christmas they get hot on charger and screen cracks right up .. i put it down on the table NOT 1 BUT BOTH did the same thing!!! HORRIBLE PHONES EVER!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Within a month on the dot my phone is broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Within a month on the dot my phone is broken.wont hold a charge. Also one minute says its at 31% the next minute says its at 6%. Not worth solmeones time or money if it just breaks in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dale

customer_reviews.title: Head jack acting up
customer_reviews.text: When my boyfriend received this product, he was telling me how the head jack would not work. Other than that, it's fine, but I'm not happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to update my dad's phone. He loves it. Great picture quality. Has alot of features.
customer_reviews.author: KJ'nyce

customer_reviews.title: The worst phone I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: The worst phone I have ever had. I have had it for 2 almost 3 months and it is crap. The screen only works when it wants to (I have never dropped it), the phone is slow, the charging port is almost broke and it never does what you want or need it to do. It is a cheap phone and great for maybe a young kid or and older person who will not need to yes it all the time. I had to get a phone pretty quick being that My old LG stylo 2 had died on me. It's a great price but not a long term phone.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Havaich

customer_reviews.title: Unusable Product
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to use the phone because the phone was never scanned at a register when the phone was bought (presumably) in store to unlock the phone for use. This is what was told to me by Virgin Mobile customer service department after I couldn't get the phone to activate due to an invalid identification number. So I sent the phone back and bought from Walmart.com, and I could not be happier with the phone, it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful phone for me to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone and have always liked how they operate and the size of the display helps a person that has poor eye sjght see the screen
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Decent and nice looking, but slows down
customer_reviews.text: Decent and sleek looking phone. I love that it's small. It's certainly does slow down after a few months though. If you want a very reliable phone that isn't frustratingly slow, I'd recommend spending more. I got this as a quick replacement after my other phone broke.
customer_reviews.author: Nel

customer_reviews.title: Great LG Phone
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone. It has a 5 inch screen but it's small and slim. I keep it in my back jeans pocket most of the time and that's very comfortable. I loaded about a half dozen apps on it that I like and I still have eight gigs of memory left. I haven't had any problems with reception or dropped calls. Voice quality is probably a average or maybe slightly above. This phone has the latest version of android (6.0) and I think it is a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jimster66

customer_reviews.title: Cell Phone Works
customer_reviews.text: The cell phone worked great for the first couple of months but there were these pop-ups that came up and I have to constantly delete apps in order to remove the pop ups. the phone still works two and a half years later.
customer_reviews.author: BeLmari

customer_reviews.title: Sim card was bad
customer_reviews.text: Sim card was bad, nothing wrong with the phone. Great shape but sim card was crap
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus

customer_reviews.title: I like this inexpensive phone
customer_reviews.text: I like this inexpensive phone.Good photoseasy acess to tge net..never froze on me..easy to use with one hand.easy pocket fit.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolita

customer_reviews.title: Way to go
customer_reviews.text: You guys rock. I received my cell days before I expected. And except for slight learning curves for activation. I'm loving it already.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Moorer

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone for the price it really superseded my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone for the price it really superseded my expectations. I've had all kinds of nice phones i actually like this more than my galaxy.

customer_reviews.title: Low on Memory
customer_reviews.text: Good Screen, Good Mic, but the memory on this phone is horrid

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly, some message kept popping up on ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work properly, some message kept popping up on the screen. Bought it early as a Christmas present for my son so I couldn't send it back. Never used it!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent E Hopson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What you see, is what you get. Phone is working well.
customer_reviews.author: T-Haze

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! LG makes the best phones, I haven't had a bad experience yet with a LG. This phone has amazing screen quality, ample storage, and is very easy to use. It comes with a SIM card, however you do need a Micro Memory Card if you want external storage.
customer_reviews.author: roseber57

customer_reviews.title: A great phone a small price
customer_reviews.text: It exceed my expectations for a 49 dlls smartphone. It take me some days to get use to the differences on Lolipop but for the price and with my family plan for 80 unlimited my wif and I with Boostmobile it really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Williamson

customer_reviews.title: It is slim and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: This phone has plenty of storage for what I need in apps. It is slim and easy to handle. Since I have Virgin Mobile for my carrier, this is just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Booth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Phone works great
customer_reviews.text: Standard shipping arrived in 2 days. Very nice. Phone works great.
customer_reviews.author: John David Colleto

customer_reviews.title: Not a sealed retail box!!!
customer_reviews.text: Editing: due to this phone working great and after testing to verify it was not a refurbished phone have to note that even though packaging was not up to a new appearance this was a new phone. This phone arived closed with tape and rubber bands.. not all looking like a new in box phone like I could have bought else where for $49.99 new in box.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Its a good looking phone with a wide screen but it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a good looking phone with a wide screen but it has problems technically. My messages often take serveral minutes to send or sometimes dont send at all. I never had that issue before this phone. The self facing camera is always blurry. Over all im not pleased with this phone .
customer_reviews.author: Neena Sarafina

customer_reviews.title: Camera quality sucks but you get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Camera quality sucks but you get what you paid for. I dont mind too much cause i cant afford a higher end smartphone and great i you're on a budget. Does everything else just as well and boost mobile is really great service or the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice phone definitely an upgrade from the Galaxy S4
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Short Battery, Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: After breaking 2 Galaxy J7s I decided to buy something less expensive. I like this phone a lot. Super lightweight and thin. Nice colors on the text messages. The one downfall is the battery, not long. Barely used it today, apps closed and it went from 100% to 35% in about 10 hours. Maybe this isn't bad but its not as good as the Galaxy. I don't see there's a battery save like the Galaxy has which is a small bummer. Over all its a nice phone for a good price
customer_reviews.author: MomTo2Nics

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! very fast shipping! It has a removable battery~

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: DON'T believe other comments. This phone is not able to be ROOTED!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Arrived sooner than expected. I love everything about the phone.

customer_reviews.title: It's  thick n lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone it's thick just like in the pictures it's the same exact phone that I have been wanting in awhile just gotta connect it to receive calls n make calls but it's a awesome phone I love it I mostly love that it's easy to use it's light weight n thick
